name: tsyne-monorepo
description: Tsyne monorepo - TypeScript wrapper for Fyne

scripts.build: npm run build:bridge && npm run build:core
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:designer
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd core && npm install && cd ../designer && npm install && cd ../examples && npm install
scripts.test:all: npm run test:core && npm run test:designer && npm run test:examples
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd core && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../designer && rm -rf node_modules dist
